includedAssets.title: Night At The Museum
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller is the new museum nightwatchman who finds his shift anything but peaceful when the exhibits come to riotous life. As the night wears on, he finds himself face to face with Owen Wilson's cowboy, President Roosevelt (Robin Williams) and Steve Coogan as a mini Roman centurion with anger management issues. Cheaper By The Dozen director Shawn Levy orchestrates the chaos in one of the biggest fantasy adventure hits of this - and any other - century.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Museum guard Ben Stiller has a wild night at work when the natural history exhibits burst into life.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ben Stiller is the new museum nightwatchman who finds his shift anything but peaceful when the exhibits come to riotous life. Cheaper By The Dozen director Shawn Levy orchestrates the chaos in one of the biggest fantasy adventure hits of this - and any other - century.

includedAssets.title: Night At The Museum 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller's bewildered museum guard is back, this time battling to keep a lid on things at the Smithsonian in Washington DC. Family fun with Owen Wilson. Flashing images.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ben Stiller's bewildered museum guard is back, this time battling to keep a lid on things at the Smithsonian in Washington DC. Family sequel.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ben Stiller's bewildered museum guard is back, this time battling to keep a lid on things at the Smithsonian in Washington DC. Family fun with Owen Wilson. Flashing images.

includedAssets.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
includedAssets.synopsis: Ben Stiller's museum guard travels to London when the life-giving tablet that animates the exhibits starts to lose its power. Family adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ben Stiller's museum guard travels to London when the life-giving tablet that animates the exhibits starts to lose its power. Family adventure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ben Stiller's museum guard travels to London when the life-giving tablet that animates the exhibits starts to lose its power. Family adventure.

includedAssets.title: Night At The Museum Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Divorced father Larry Daley can't keep a job for more than a week, but when he accepts the role of night guard at the American Museum of Natural History, he discovers that after sunset an ancient spell brings the exhibits to life. From then on he must fight to save his new friends from thieves, evil Pharaohs, crazed knights and mischievous monkeys. Fantasy family trilogy starring Ben Stiller, Robin Williams, Ricky Gervais, Owen Wilson, Steve Coogan and Amy Adams.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Night guard Larry Daley discovers that after sunset, the exhibits of the American Museum of Natural History come alive. Trilogy starring Ben Stiller.

includedIn.title: Night at the Museum
includedIn.synopsis: While working as a night guard at the American Museum of Natural History, divorced father Larry Daley discovers that after sunset, an ancient spell brings the exhibits to life.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: While working as a night guard at the American Museum of Natural History, Larry Daley discovers that after sunset, all the exhibits come to life.
